item.description: Meet at the cafe's parking lot. We can eat at the cafe after the kayaking for lunch. Kayak or canoe rentals by the hour. Single kayak - $15, double kayak - $20, large & long canoe - $25. Life jckets and paddles are provided. Beginners are welcome and this part of the river is calm and wonderful for sightseeing. I will need a head count for rentals ASAP so I can call in and reserve. If you are to rent they only take cash! You can also bring your own. It is suppose to be a beautiful day so hope to see you there!
item.name: Kayak the Charles River
